ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com magic_ring jack o lantern pattern pattern difficulty medium i assume you already know how to crochet how to crochet in the round how to read a pattern and how to sew pieces together supplies size g hook worsted weight yarn red heart super saver works nicely  orange  dk green  brown  black gauge is unimportant for this project terms single_crochet = single_crochet increase = increase two single_crochet in same stitch decrease = decrease crochet two stitches together blo = back loops only note jack is worked in the round when i crochet i join rounds and i single_crochet in the same space as joining so i m assuming that at the end of each round you do the same and are slip stitching to the first stitch of that round and that you chain 1 to start the next round you can work in spirals if that s easier for you just remember to mark your rounds you want your stitches tight and close together so the stuffing doesn t show through later on to start each piece you can chain 2 and work your 6 stitches into the 2nd stitch from the hook or you can use the magic_ring be creative and have fun page 2 of 8 copyright by sherri bush http //www ravelry com/designers/sherri-bush sherricrochets@gmail com head row instruction stitches 1 using orange 6 chain 2 6 single_crochet in second chain from hook join chain 1 2 *2
